Uses of Class
io.hekate.metrics.statsd.StatsdMetricsConfig

  • Packages that use StatsdMetricsConfig 
    Package Description
    io.hekate.metrics.statsd
    Support for metrics publishing to StatsD.
    io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.statsd
    Auto-configuration for StatsdMetricsPlugin.

    • Uses of StatsdMetricsConfig in io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.statsd

      Methods in io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.statsd that return StatsdMetricsConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatsdMetricsConfig StatsdMetricsPluginConfigurer.statsdMetricsConfig(MetricFilterGroup filter)
      Conditionally constructs a new configuration for StatsdMetricsPlugin if application doesn't provide its own Bean of StatsdMetricsConfig type.
      Methods in io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.statsd with parameters of type StatsdMetricsConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
